plugin.name: Alt Text Automator
plugin.homepage.title: Alt Text Automator
plugin.settings.apiKey.label: API Key
plugin.settings.button.save.label: Save
plugin.settings.enabled: Automatically generate alt text for new images
plugin.settings.general.title: General settings
plugin.settings.title: Alt Text Automator settings
plugin.settings.description: To use this plugin, you need to create an account on {link}. Once you have an account, you can get your API key from the {settingsLink}.
plugin.settings.enabled.hint: When enabled, alt text will be automatically generated for new images.

plugin.settings.language.label: Language
plugin.homepage.description: The Alt Text Automator plugin automatically generates alt text for images uploaded to your Strapi media library. To use this plugin, you need to need to connect your account on the settings page.
